body_html:
I reproduced this.
Can anyone reopen this issue? I need help.

OS Platform and Distribution: CentOS 7.5
TensorFlow installed from: Download the source from this repo.
TensorFlow version: 1.10.0
Bazel version: 0.16.1
CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.2/7.2
GPU model and memory: NVIDIA P2000 with 5 GB.
Exact command to reproduce: run tf-cnn-benchmark. grpc mode and grpc+verbs mode seem to be fine.

I attach the log with the environmental variables (#15541).

tf-log.txt

body:
I reproduced this.
Can anyone reopen this issue? I need help.

OS Platform and Distribution: CentOS 7.5
TensorFlow installed from: Download the source from this repo.
TensorFlow version: 1.10.0
Bazel version: 0.16.1
CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.2/7.2
GPU model and memory: NVIDIA P2000 with 5 GB.
Exact command to reproduce: run tf-cnn-benchmark. grpc mode and grpc+verbs mode seem to be fine.

I attach the log with the environmental variables (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/15541?_pjax=%23js-repo-pjax-container#issuecomment-353841661).

[tf-log.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/2321619/tf-log.txt)
